modName: Fina Follower - Standalone - CBBE BBP - Dream Girl TBBP - SeveNBase BBP - UNP - UNPB BBP
summary: This mod adds a standalone companion, named Fina, to your game, with a short un-logged quest to find her.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fzb6Kv9.jpg[/img]
[font=Verdana]

[color=red][center][size=3]A port to Skyrim Special Edition has been created by [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/9029132]beaunidle[/url][/b]!
[b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6099]Fina Follower CBBE-UNP for SSE[/url][/i][/b][/size][/center][/color]

[color=orange][b]Credits (in Alphabetical Order)[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8][b]alduin78[/b] for creating the [i]Dream Girl[/i] - [i]Women of Skyrim[/i] version of this mod
[b]azarkiowa[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/]Ponytail Hairsyles[/url][/i]
[b]Caliente[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition - CBBE[/url][/i]
[b]dimon99[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP Female Body[/url][/i]
[b]expired6978[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/]CharGen Extension[/url][/i]
[b]greentea101[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9797/]Unfuzer[/url][/i]
[b]hellosanta[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url][/i] and for [i]SG HairPack[/i]
[b]LogRaam[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes of Beauty[/url][/i]
[b]lthot[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows[/url][/i]
[b]monababii[/b] for screenshots, mod testing and concept design
[b]MrTroubleMaker[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179/]Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC[/url][/i]
[b]natilde[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs[/url][/i]
[b]Petrovich[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443/]Dream Girl[/url][/i]
[b]Sevennity[/b]*, [b]Wast1980[/b], [b]Demonhunter[/b] and [b]Crosscrusade[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase Body[/url][/i]
[b]SvarogNL[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16731/]Fitness Body Normal Maps[/url][/i]
[b]SydneyB[/b] for [i][url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Using_a_face_made_with_Chargen_Extension_on_an_NPC_for_Skyrim]Tutorial: Using a face made with Chargen Extension on an NPC for Skyrim[/url][/i]
[b]turulo[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/]NPC Nif Merge[/url][/i]
[b]Xenius[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url][/i]
[b]xp32[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i]
[b]xs2reality[/b]* for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/]Sporty Sexy Sweat - Wet Body Skin Texture[/url][/i]
[b]YOYO[/b] from [i]ButterFly Sims[/i] for [i][url=http://www.butterflysims.com/download/bencandy.php?fid=46&id=857]Hair[/url][/i]
[b]zzjay[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/]Women of Skyrim[/url][/i]

and, finally, to me, BrotherBob*.

*Mod author whose assets are included in this mod package.[/color]

[color=orange][b]Permissions[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]You may not translate, modify, convert, or otherwise create a derivative product from this mod, in whole or in part, for public use without the permission of all mod authors whose assets are included in this mod package. You may not upload this mod, or derivative products, anywhere without the permission of all mod authors whose assets are included in this mod.[/color]

[color=orange][b]Translations[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]Polish:Â [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86437/]Fina Follower - Polish Translation[/url][/i][/color]

[color=orange][b]Requirements[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]This mod adds a mostly-standalone companion to the game. That means that most assets that are required to allow this mod to function are already included in the installation package. Notable exceptions include a BBP-supporting skeleton for the BBP versions of this mod. An example of such as skeleton is the [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url][/i].[/color]

[color=orange][b]Backstory[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]Fina is the companion added by this mod. She is a Breton, but her elven background is more evident, from her ears. Despite her pronounced background, she favours melee combat. She is a trained one-handed warrior, especially deadly when dual wielding. The rest of her backstory will be left for you, the player, to infer based on your own imaginings.[/color]

[color=orange][b]Usage[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]Fina is encountered in Bleakcoast Cave, southeast of Winterhold. After completing her short un-logged quest, she will head into town. Who knows which tavern she will go to, but perhaps the gods have destined you two to meet again at the Bannered Mare (where she will return to if she is dismissed as a follower later). From here, she may be made a follower and/or marriage partner. She has 3 additional dialogue lines at this point, accessible based on the player character's gender and marital status. These dialogue lines are present purely for entertainment.
She levels with the player at a rate of 1.00x, from a minimum level of 10 to a maximum level of 125. She has the following perks: Armsman (rank 3), Dual Flurry (rank 1), and Light Foot.[/color]

[b][color=orange]Installation[/color][/b]
[color=#0ecfe8]This mod is offered with the choice of 5 body types: CBBE BBP, UNP, UNPB BBP, SeveNBase Bombshell BBP, and Dream Girl TBBP. Choose the one that you prefer Fina to have. Once the installtion pacakage is downloaded, you can use a Mod Manager to install the files, or you can extract the files yourself and merge the files and folders contained within with your Skyrim install's Data folder. Uninstallation may be achieved by removing these installed files.[/color]

[b][color=orange]Version History[/color][/b]
[color=#0ecfe8]v1.4:
- Initial public release
- Removed due to accidental inclusion of hair mesh asset
v1.9
- Uses Vanilla hair mesh temporarily
- Recommended use with hair-changing mod
- Removed Fina from the Whiterun Crime Faction
v2.1
- Uses ponytail hairstyle from [b]azarkiowa[/b]'s [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/]Ponytail Hairstyles[/url][/i]
v2.1.1
- Update package (requires pre-installation of the v2.1 main package) removes two dirty cell edits using [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url][/i][/color][/font]
author: BrotherBob
